steps.name: Given  I want to search for Hotel Availability search for two Adults
When  I Enter the checkIn date as "2021-07-19" checkOut as "2" Night Count as "3" Hotel Code as "EAN311048" City as "DXB"
Then  I should get a successful response as status code 200
